content: Teach your little science enthusiast about the transformative power of green energy using this potato clock science kit. The kit includes a digital clock, wires, and prongs – all you need to do is hook the prongs up to two spuds in order to power the small digital clock.

Awe at the wonders of science by creating abstract and constantly changing formations using this interactive magnetic Ferrofluid lava lamp. Each lamp comes filled with 15 mL of manipulable Ferrofluide that continuously rises and falls like a traditional lava lamp.

Fall into a soothing and relaxing sleep faster than ever before with help from this deep sleep pillow spray. Just a few spritzes of this clinically proven spray is all you’ll need to fall asleep faster and wake up feeling more refreshed than ever.

titleEN: DJI Mavic Air Ultra Portable Folding Drone
content: Capturing amazing aerial footage when you’re on-the-go is more convenient than ever with the DJI Mavic Air ultra portable folding drone. Despite its smartphone-sized frame, it’s built with a 12 MP 1/2.3-inch CMOS sensor camera capable of 4K video at 30fps at 100 Mbps.

Just like the cute reptiles they’re modeled after, these vibrant chameleon shaped lights are able to copy the colors around them. Once placed on top of any colorful item, this neat lamp utilizes special sensors to match the color of whatever it is placed on top of.

Enjoy the great outdoors with friends without having to sleep on the ground like some kind of neanderthal by using the multi-level hammock. Once anchored to the surrounding trees, this sturdy hammock provides a multi-tiered rest spot that you and your group can enjoy.

Keep Mr. Whiskers from ruining your nice hooman furniture by keeping him entertained with the ultimate cat scratcher lounge. Made of layers of recycled cardboard and non-toxic corn starch glue, it’s ultra sturdy and can be reversed so that it lasts for twice as long.

titleEN: Quad Flame Butane Torch Cigar Lighter
content: Quit wasting your money on cheap lighters and spark up in style using this quad flame butane torch cigar lighter. This windproof lighter features a metallic and plastic exterior, a fold out cigar cutter, and a 3-sided viewing window that let’s you know when it’s time to refill.

Stay in control of your vehicle when the roads get icy with these snow traction tire socks. They’re inexpensive, machine washable, and are made up of a patented woven material that allows for extra traction at speeds of up to 25 mph.

This unfolding book lamp is the ideal way to give your reading nook a touch of warm ambient lighting. The book opens up to reveal an accordion-like stream of glowing pages that you can rest on a desk or hang up on the wall.

Special gel flex seat cushion supports so well you can sit on an egg! The honeycomb grid allows air to circulate through the cushion so it stays cool to the touch. Measuring 17″x15″, the Egg Sitter fits just about any seat and includes a machine-washable cover.

Get your fill of cookies without having to venture outside of your home by signing up the OREO cookie club subscription box. Available in 3, 6, or 12 month options, each month you’ll receive a care package with two OREO flavors, a recipe card, and a unique gift.

Level up your photography game by creating some mind-blowing effects using this spherical crystal lens. Available in either an 80mm or 60mm size, each scratch-resistant K9 crystal beautifully reflects an inverted view of your surroundings.

Make those bitter cold winter mornings go by a little bit smoother with the heated ice scraper. This handy appliance comes with a built-in flashlight, squeegee, and features a heated edge to help you easily melt away the snow and ice that builds on your windshield.

Help maintain a youthful and healthy look without having to dig into your girlfriend’s creams by applying Beau Brummell gentlemen’s facial mask. It’s made with natural activated charcoal that detoxifies the skin by absorbing oils and bacteria from deep within pores.

Give your party snacks some extra curb appeal by serving them on this volcano eruption serving and dipping bowl. The clever design lets you create a disaster scenario where a small cottage is overrun by a spicy and delicious stream of salsa.

Experience the best of both worlds by creating one of a kind pancake waffles with this life-changing appliance. With this pancake and waffle hybrid maker you’ll be able to whip up light and fluffy pancakes with a delicious waffle center.

Simultaneously pay homage to your favorite Post Impressionist and school of witchcraft by brightening up your home with this Starry Nights Harry Potter Hogwarts painting. The iconic school of witchcraft and wizardry is painted in the style of van Gogh’s masterpiece.

Take the art of pranking to new heights with help from this big box of 4,500 live ladybugs. Apart from serving as little props for your hilarious pranks, ladybugs also make a great gift for insect enthusiasts or as a house-warming gift for an ex.

Minimize the risk of break-ins at your business by installing the intruder defense system. This reasonably priced freestanding burglar deterrent is crafted from heavy duty steel and can be easily installed on any 36 inch wide commercial door.

Strut your stuff and turn heads by wearing the shark bite bathing suit on your next beach excursion. This fashionable one piece is designed to resemble a shark’s fierce bite and allows you to show off your ripped beach bod while entertaining your fellow beach goers.

With the hands-free baby bottle feeder system, you’ll be able to feed your bundle of joy without having to pull over. This BPA and lead-free bottle allows your baby to control the flow of the feed while also helping to prevent gas, colic, ear infections, and reflux.

Juice up to five of your electronic devices all at once with the Nomad wireless multi-port charging hub. It’s compact, comes with 5 backside USB ports with a max output of 27W along with small LED indicator lights that informs you of the charging status.

Save time and effort by preparing your delicious meals with help from this smart automatic pot stirrer. This portable kitchen aid is designed for pots measuring 6 to 12 inches in diameter, and will prevent your food from sticking, burning, and pot scorching.

Transform any campfire into a practical cooking area by laying your food on this portable roll-out BBQ grill. It features an incredibly simple roll-out design and comes with a size-adjustable stake stand for campfire setups that makes it easy to increase desired heat levels.

Keep yourself well lubricated without arousing suspicion by discreetly hiding your booze inside this flask bracelet. This fashionable stainless steel accessory holds up to 3 ounces, comes with a top screw and silicone seal, and features a lovely rainbow plated finish.

Enhance the effect of your favorite party-time drugs with these diffraction glasses. These one of a kind shades come equipped with specialized lenses that create incredible visual effects, amplifying your concert going experience to the fullest!

Keep your phone running all day without having to lug around a cumbersome charger by juicing it up using the paper thin solar charger. The revolutionary ultra thin and lightweight design allows you to easily place it inside your notebook for unmatched portability.

titleEN: Triple Jet Flame Butane Torch Lighter
content: Spark up in style by lighting your cigarettes or cigars using this triple jet flame butane torch lighter. This windproof refillable butane lighter comes with a cigar hole punch attachment along with a textured grip and slide-switch operation for fast and easy use.

Harness the power of technology to battle the bitter cold by outfitting your home with the heated stair mat. This tough stair mat is designed to handle all the rigors of winter and melts up to two inches of snow per hour so that your steps remain snow free.

No home arcade would be complete without one of the greatest games of all time – skeeball. And now you can own your very own skeeball machine like you played on during your childhood. You can finally steal as many tickets as you want, and cheat as much as you want.

Ensure your next big blowout has a killer soundtrack by entertaining your guests with the DropMix music gaming system. Each card you drop onto the main platform activates a track which blends seamlessly with other cards to create truly unique and incredible mixes.

titleEN: Hyper Blaster Virtual Reality Gaming Gun
content: Learn to shoot like a true marksman in Duckhunt by picking up this hyper blaster virtual reality gaming gun. This Vive Tracker ready gun features a retro design, a mechanical trigger with a nostalgic click, two grip buttons, and a single-function trackpad button.

Going to bed will turn into the best part of the day once you begin sleeping in one of these Star Wars adult onesies. Star Wars fans will be able to dress up like Boba Fett, Vader, a Stormtrooper, or a valiant Jedi warrior every single night and sleep like a baby.

Achieve inner peace by learning how to let go and live in the moment with the Buddha Board water drawing set. Simply fill the base with water, dip the bamboo brush, and begin drawing – as the water evaporates your masterpiece slowly fades away.

Relieve congestion without resorting to pharmaceuticals by using this nasal rinsing system. It powers water through your nose, guiding it back out through a gentle suction motion that’ll leave your nasal passages feeling completely unobstructed.

Multitask like never before by adding a second or even third display to your laptop using this tablet mounting clip. It supports all modern tablets, allows you to add screens on the side or top, and sports a pass-through channel that hides the charging cord.

Slice through mail like a fearless warrior in the heat of battle these letter opener swords. With the legendary ancestral swords of House Mormont and House Stark in your grip, opening the mail will become the highlight of your uneventful and monotonous day.

If analog clocks aren’t your thing, try this minimalistic LED clock on for size. The digital clock is easy to read from far away, comes with a 12/24 hour display, an alarm clock, and an adaptive light sensor that reduces the brightness during nighttime.

If you didn’t get your fill of the adorable Baby Groot in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2, then this Baby Groot flower pot is just for you. This little seven inch tall Baby Groot comes with a hollowed out head that’s perfectly suited for tiny plants like succulents and cacti.

Teaching the little whipper snappers about electricity is easier and more fun than ever with this kids electronic discovery kit. This educational kit comes with 30 parts and instructions for over 100 enjoyable projects like an adjustable volume siren and a flashing light.

Need a foolproof reminder system? Just hang this door hanger memo pad on the inside of your door and your messages will never get overlooked! The practical shape allows the sign to be hung virtually anywhere in your home – like a door, a closet, or a drawer knob.

Turn your next shower into an enthralling experience by upgrading to the Aurajet shower head. The halo design is full of small openings that are specially positioned to create a criss-cross pattern that expands coverage without sacrificing water pressure.

The Garmin Vivoactive 3 smartwatch is the high-tech timepiece that is ideal for those who love to stay connected while staying active. It can do everything from monitoring your heart rate and daily activity to ordering you an Uber.

Play tricks on your eyes with this color isolating lenticular plastic lens. Each small rectangular plastic lens comes in sets of 5 non-adhesive sheets that will hide certain colors depending on the angle at which you hold them.

The OFYR Corten steel grill is the ultimate in outdoor backyard cooking. The bold and contemporary statue-like design enables you to perform everything from steaming and flambeing to stewing and grilling, so that you can keep your guests feeling happy and full.

These matches are the ultimate survival tool. Completely waterproof, they’ll light even if drenched. And once lit they cannot be blown out. Entirely windproof, they’ll even burn in a hurricane! Submerge a lit match in water? It will still continue to burn!

Turn almost any location into the perfect karaoke spot by putting on a performance with this mini karaoke microphone. It easily connects to you and lets you to record or sing along while still allowing you to access your phone’s other features.

Turn your backyard into your very own private Jurassic Park with this giant Brahiosaurus dinosaur statue. Cast in quality designer resin, this massive 314 pound hand painted dino statue stands over 15 feet tall and masterfully depicts the now extinct 80 ton beast.

Enjoy a deep hibernation-like slumber next time you hit the hay by slipping into this black bear sleeping bag. It can accommodate a person up to 72 inches tall and covers you from head to toe in a soft and snuggly black bear suit – complete with a fluffy bear head hood.

With the Nintendo Labo Switch cardboard kits you will be able to transform your console into anything from a piano to a fishing rod. Each DIY flat pack cardboard kit works with the Switch’s sensors to become controllers that you can use to play fun games.

Make your new place feel a little more like home by lighting up your very own homesick scented candle. Each hand poured all natural soy wax candle features its very own unique scent that captures the essence of places like Denver, LA, NYC, the UK, and Australia.

Easily categorize the greatness of your facial hair as it grows over time using this beard measurement chart shirt. You’ll be able to track your daily progress as it goes from a “manly” stubble to a distinguished “wizardly” mane.

If you love cars and music, you’ll go wild for this Porsche 911 exhaust pipe speaker. This high-end 60-watt Bluetooth speaker delivers clear crisp sound from a high quality aluminum housing built with the original exhaust pipe from a Porsche 911 GT3.

This Solgaard luggage with pop-up shelves is your ticket to ensuring your things remain organized during long trips. This TSA approved carry-on comes with a handy retractable shelving system that compartmentalizes your things so that you can keep order while you travel.

Stand out at any party, club, or rave you attend by slipping into one of these light up hoodies. Featuring a variety of colored electric rope running through the seam of the zipper and the hood itself, the light up hoodie is great for turning heads at night.

Get an old school typewriter feel from your modern PC by plugging in this typewriter inspired mechanical keyboard. This 100% NKRO tactile and clicky keyboard is water resistant, dust proof, and comes with an eye catching design featuring handcrafted rounded edges.

titleEN: Heavy Duty Snow & Ice Traction Cleats
content: Instantly turn your favorite hiking boots into the ultimate snow boots with these heavy duty snow and ice traction cleats. The patented Boa Closure system ensures a secure fit while the 3/8 inch abrasion resistant carbon steel spikes dig into the packed snow and ice.

Make even the dullest party outfit come alive by accenting your look with these glowing LED eyelashes. These eye-catching accessories are as light as a feather and come with 7 lighting modes – complete with a sound control mode for amazing effects.

Make your favorite carnivore’s mouth water with this bacon lovers feast gift basket. This bountiful basket comes packed with three 1 pound bags of prime cracked pepper and garlic bacon, applewood smoked maple sugar bacon, and chipotle bacon.

Instantly add a touch of whimsy to any part of your humble abode by hanging up a few of these air plant flying jellyfish. The set comes with three air plants set inside three Alphones sea urchins that combine to create a gravity-defying arrangement.

Step your game up on Taco Tuesday by laying out all your yummy taco fixins on this taco bar serving platter. This ceramic taco server is divided up into labeled compartments with room for everything from the tortillas to the cheese and comes with a silver serving spoon.

titleEN: Furry Memory Foam Bean Bag Chair
content: What better way to spend a dreary winter day than on this furry memory foam bean bag chair? This insanely comfortable chair sports an ultra soft memory foam blend filling along with a super cozy machine washable faux fur cover ideal for snuggling up in.

Reduce the clutter in your toolbox by replacing a slew of sockets with the universal socket. This power drill compatible socket features a sturdy stainless steel construction in addition to 54 retractable hardened pins to accommodate sizes between 7mm to 19mm.

Quit throwing your money away on flimsy writing utensils by upgrading to the unbreakable mechanical pencil. It employs an ingenious double spring mechanism and a specially designed tip that greatly reduces the likelihood of breaking the lead – no matter how hard you press.

With the pizza oven grill kit you’ll be able to enjoy a delicious home cooked pie during every Sunday BBQ. The stainless steel attachment instantly transforms your kettle grill into a genuine coal burning pizza oven. You’ll never have to settle for a frozen pizza again.

Reduce your chances of getting a flat while you’re on the road by monitoring your tires with the smart tire safety monitor. Four Bluetooth sensors mount to the valve stems of your vehicle’s tires so that you can easily monitor your tires’s conditions from your smartphone.

Transform any room in your home with incredible accent lighting by decorating it with this light up furniture. Each free standing cordless and waterproof piece comes with a remote control featuring 4 dynamic color change modes – strobe, flash, smooth, and face.

Give your training an added dose of realism by swapping out your outdated equipment for these water filled punching bags. The unique design of these water filled punching bags resembles the feeling of punching an actual human body.

Ensure you never under or overcook a slab of meat again by grilling it to perfection with help from this BBQ thermocouple thermometer. It features a compact waterproof body and provides a temperature reading with an accuracy of ±0.9° in just 2 to 3 seconds.

Finally finish that novel you’ve been working on for the better part of your adult life using this distraction free smart typewriter. It comes with a full size mechanical keyboard and an internal capacity to store over one million pages, so you can work uninterrupted.

Ward off the Resistance – or any intruder who tries to enter your bedroom – by placing this Star Wars augmented reality stormtrooper robot on patrol. It comes with facial recognition, takes direct verbal orders, and can launch attacks via the app interface.

Confront your fears head-on with the pop-up book of phobias. This twisted work of genius features everything from the fear of clowns to the fear of doctors and needles, and puts you right in front of the action to experience your worst nightmare come to life.

The black diamond knife block brings a touch of style to your kitchen without sacrificing on performance. It features an eye-catching hollow three dimensional geometric base that can house up to eleven kitchen knives.

Capture amazing shots wherever you go with the flexible smart phone charger. This unique charger features an adjustable cable that holds its shape however you bend it, allowing you to position the phone at the ideal angle and eliminate shaky and blurry pictures.

Place a stylish spin on the way you tell time with this elegant black steel ceramic quartz watch. Instead of relying on a standard flat face, this steel and ceramic watch sports a three dimensional surface that contours outwards and lets you feel the time through touch.

The Alpha portable snow shovel is the last snow moving tool you will ever need to buy. This multi-terrain shovel can be adjusted from 18 to 63 inches and sports a sturdy aluminum construction with a serrated edge that is ideal for breaking through ice and compacted snow.

Use this bumper sticker to show your support and help America return to the status quo of political mediocrity where politicians at least pretended to care about their constituents and were coherent enough to keep their empty political promises consistent!

Ensure you’re prepared for whatever comes your way when you’re on the job or in the wild, by packing along the Leatherman Signal multi-tool. This versatile tool weighs only 7.5 ounces and comes stocked with a total of 10 tools that range from a sharp blade to a fire starter.

Give every room in your home its own unique color scheme and ambiance using these modular smart lighting panels. Each kit comes with 9 LED panels that you can mount – onto the wall or ceiling – in any shape you wish to create visually stimulating designs.

Place a new spin on the way you tell time by accessorizing with the clock ring. This 3161 stainless steel ring requires minimal upkeep, features a comfortable smooth polished finish, is scratch resistant, and even hypoallergenic.

Ensure your electronic devices remain juiced up when you venture away from the city by toting this off-grid solar panel backpack. This 10W backpack comes with a large panel that can charge your smartphone in just 2 hours in addition to a 12,000mAh backup battery.

Cultivate an atmosphere of serenity in your humble abode by planting your very own blue maple bonsai tree. The seeds of this beautiful and rare bonsai are relatively easy to plant and grow – making it an ideal gift for novice bonsai enthusiasts.

Say good bye to dangerous candles with this LED flame effect bulb. Made to simulate real flames, they’re easy to install in your home, patio, restaurant, bar, or hotel! Sit back and relax with the pros with TYPRO bulbs lighting the way in innovation.

Transform your plain walls into a fun playground for your feline friends using this cat hammock activity center. It features a series of canvas hammocks, small wooden planks, and a large sisal rope pole that will keep your kitty entertained for hours on end.

Create the illusion of a supernova going off in your home every time you pull the cord and turn on this Ikea pendant lamp. This eye-catching piece features a fragmented spherical design that will give your room style as the light seeps through the parted edges.

Turn your run-of-the-mill writing utensil into the perfect paper ball launching weapon with this pencil slingshot. This metallic clip slips over the pencil’s eraser end to transform it into a tiny yet functional catapult designed for small paper balls.

titleEN: Whiskey Tasting Glass With Chilling Base
content: This whiskey tasting glass with chilling base will revolutionize the way you drink your favorite spirits. It features a metal cooling base that keeps the drink chilled for up to 30 minutes while the glass helps reveal the most sublime notes from a wide range of liqueurs.

Your favorite game of physical skill and flexibility is now more portable than with this Finger Twister mini board game. It’s fun, small enough to fit on any desktop, and provides a great way of improving overall finger dexterity while you play with friends.

Keep Jr. busy and entertained while you’re occupied with more important matters by letting him go wild with the My First Fire Starting Kit. Boredom get ready to meet your match, because where there is smoke, there’s a guaranteed good time!

Give onlookers a peak at your bodacious dad bod by storing your goodies in this hairy gut fanny pack. It features a large zippered compartment along with a hilarious and life-like graphic that creates the illusion you have a hairy beer belly poking out of your shirt.

Increase the serenity factor of your bedroom by creating some quaint ambient lighting with this cloud ceiling lamp. Apart from spicing up your room’s bland decor, this decorative light emits a soft white glow that gives this puffy cumulus cloud incredible depth.

Life’s too short to drink skunk beer. Enjoy a quality brew without having to venture outside by outfitting your bar with this craft beer home tap machine.This 67 ounce capacity tap is designed to keep your favorite brew fresh, chilled, and pressurized for up to 2 weeks.

Make your dream of owning a rubber burning muscle car a reality by plopping down on this one of a kind race car bed. The sturdy race car frame is capable of holding up to 300 pounds and comes with built-in sound effects and functioning LED headlights.

Enjoy your favorite pub game from the comfort of home with this cardboard foosball table. Crafted from recyclable cardboard and sustainably harvested wood, it assembles with no tools, has regulation length dimensions, and comes with a built-in iPhone speaker.

The no holes track leather belt’s ergonomic and functional design means that you’ll always achieve the perfect fit – no matter your waist size. This full-grain leather belt’s design lets you adjust your belt in small increments to ensure the perfect fit.

titleEN: Ultra Realistic Animal Face Ski Masks
content: Turn heads as you shred down the slopes by staying warm with one of these ultra realistic animal face ski masks. Each of these windproof and dustproof masks are breathable, quick-drying, and are emblazoned with a vivid animal print complete with cute 3D ears.

Save money by getting every last drop of toothpaste out from the tube with help from this toothpaste tube squeezer. It features a sturdy aluminum body and a simple design that requires you to turn the stainless steel screw in order to properly wring out the tube.

Hate warm beer? The Hopsulator TRiO is the world’s first 3-in-1, insulated beer koozie that fits 16oz cans, includes a freezable adapter for 12oz cans, and a lid for use as a pint glass while keeping your favorite beverage 20x colder than a standard koozie.

Keep a watchful eye over your home or office without anyone becoming the wiser by using this mini spy hidden camera. It can support up to a 32GB memory card, records at 1920 X 1080P HD at 30 frames per second upon sensing movement.
